game.name: Chainsaw Woods
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A survival horror game where you must escape from a forest you've gotten lost in. The forest is randomly generated each time you play. Supports online co-op for up to 2 players. Work together to escape from the forest!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A survival horror game where you must escape from a forest you've gotten lost in. The forest is randomly generated each time you play. Supports online co-op for up to 2 players. Work together to escape from the forest!
